path: artifacts/BICHON TOKENT Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.BICHON: contracts/BICHON TOKENT Full Smart Contract Security Audit/BICHON

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is long.
findings.location: Functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the BICHON TOKENT contract.
